casebody.data:
ADMINISTRATIVE DOCKET

In re Re-Petition of the Massachusetts School of Law for Permission for its Graduates to Take the Bar Examination.

On May 22, 2000, the Massachusetts School of Law filed a Re-Petition for its Graduates to Take the Bar Examination, and on August 7, 2000, it filed a Motion to Supplement the Record. Upon consideration thereof,

IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the Re-Petition be, and hereby is, denied.
